subscriptionMain.title: Upgrade your plan
subscriptionMain.moreFeatures: Need more features for your business?
subscriptionMain.expiryNotice: Please be advised that you may continue to access your subscription service until {{date}}. Until then, feel free to renew or continue enjoying the service at your convenience. Make the most of the remaining period with all the features and benefits we offer.
subscriptionMain.expiryNotice2: How was your experience with us?
subscriptionMain.reasonCancel: Please let us know your reason for cancellation
subscriptionMain.placeholder_reason: Please briefly state your reason for cancellation
subscriptionMain.placeholder_feedback: Feel free to share your feedback

free_features: ✔ Real-time data from the web via search
✔ Limited access to file uploads, advanced data analysis, and image generation

plus_features: ✔ Includes all features from Free plan
✔ Increased limits for messages, file uploads, advanced data analysis, and image generation
✔ Create tasks and projects, and customize your OrbitMate experience
✔ Limited access to file uploads and advanced data analysis features
✔ Early access to new features and experiments

ultimate_features: ✔ Includes all features from Plus plan
✔ Unlimited access to all inference models and OrbitMate-4o
✔ Unlimited access to advanced voice capabilities
✔ Higher limits for multi-step online research in complex tasks
✔ Access to Codex Agent research preview
✔ Early access to new features and experimental tools

business_features: ✔ Unlimited user accounts for all employees
✔ Support for custom AI models and dedicated research capabilities
✔ Large-scale data analysis and custom report generation
✔ Dedicated customer support and technical consulting services
✔ Enhanced security and data privacy management

paymentComplete.cancel_info_body: You can cancel your subscription anytime via the ‘My Subscriptions’ section in the OrbitMate app. Cancellation will take effect from the next billing cycle, and refunds are not provided. For further assistance, please contact Support.

about_us.title: The Dream Team
about_us.description:
5 brains. 1 vision. We’re the minds behind OrbitMate — a next-gen AI platform built to make smart feel simple.
From complex engineering to human-first design, our team of five blends code, creativity, and caffeine to craft an AI experience that’s fast, intuitive, and just a little bit magic.
about_us.ContactUs2: You may reach out to use with these info

about_each.jayRole: I worked on the overall UI and database integration, focusing on a unique design that fits the service concept. I aimed to balance functionality with a refined user experience.
about_each.wooRole: Refactored the frontend code to enhance readability and maintainability. During backend and API integration, I coordinated data structures and request methods to ensure smooth service operation.
about_each.simRole: Handled the entire backend, including AI model integration and external API consolidation. Managed database design and maintenance, as well as server configuration, ensuring stable and reliable service operation.
about_each.eunRole: Responsible for implementing features across the project, focusing on both frontend and backend development to ensure a cohesive and functional user experience.

ChatLog.waiting_message: AI is scanning beyond the galaxy...!
